A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As others have posted\, this movie was terrible. It really isn't a Star Wars movie and threw away everything we knew and loved about Luke. I agree with all of the other comments here regarding the terrible aspects of the movie\, but also just as a movie in general\, it was awful. The pacing and storytelling was chaotic and choppy - perhaps to cater to the younger generation with no attention span? There were storylines and characters (Rose) that could have been removed and would not have changed the story in the end. I felt frustrated throughout the movie and left the theater feeling heartbroken.
